body_html: @vishwakftw Sorry for the delay on this - I think your original idea of putting from test_autograd import random_fullrank_matrix_distinct_singular_value in _test_matrix_power is actually the correct one, as it prevents other tests that depend on test_torch.py to also depend on test_autograd.py. Do you mind reverting the commit for this (dcf13e5) and I can push it through internally? Thanks a lot and sorry for the confusion on this one.
body_text: @vishwakftw Sorry for the delay on this - I think your original idea of putting from test_autograd import random_fullrank_matrix_distinct_singular_value in _test_matrix_power is actually the correct one, as it prevents other tests that depend on test_torch.py to also depend on test_autograd.py. Do you mind reverting the commit for this (dcf13e5) and I can push it through internally? Thanks a lot and sorry for the confusion on this one.
body: @vishwakftw Sorry for the delay on this - I think your original idea of putting `from test_autograd import random_fullrank_matrix_distinct_singular_value` in `_test_matrix_power` is actually the correct one, as it prevents other tests that depend on `test_torch.py` to also depend on `test_autograd.py`. Do you mind reverting the commit for this (`dcf13e5`) and I can push it through internally? Thanks a lot and sorry for the confusion on this one.
